member.name: T:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary
member.summary: The main class for the bestiary, everything should be accessible from this class

member.name: P:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.IncludeDownpourEntries
member.summary: Whether downpour entries are shown or not, true if more slug cats is enabled, otherwise false

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.CreatureUnlockIDs
member.summary: All the unlocked entries, this determines if an entry should be unlocked or not, even if a piece of the description is visible, the entry wont be visible unless its id is in this list

member.name: P:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.ModuleUnlocks
member.summary: All the manual module unlock tokens, the first element defines the id of the creature the token belongs to, the second element is a list of all unlock tokens belonging to that creature
member.remarks: If you'd like to add your own token, I'd recommended using as it will increase the token if it exists, otherwise adds it, (which just means you don't need to write, essentially the same code, yourself)

member.name: M:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.AddOrIncreaseModuleUnlock(System.String,RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if contains an that belongs to the given creature, if it does, the module unlock token gets increased by 1, otherwise its added as a new element
member.param: The ID of the creature this unlock token will target
The type of token
Whether to add this creatureID to if it's not already in there. is the list that determines whether an entry is unlocked or not, read ' summary for more details

member.name: M:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.IsUnlockTokenValid(RainWorldBestiary.CreatureUnlockToken)
member.summary: Checks if the given token is in either AutoModuleUnlocks or ModuleUnlocks
member.remarks: Returns true if the count is equal to or greater than the value in the registered token Does not take into account if is toggled

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.EntriesTabs
member.summary: All the tabs, which hold all the entries, you can add your own, or add your entry to an existing tab

member.summary: The tab that is currently selected

member.name: P:RainWorldBestiary.Bestiary.CurrentSelectedEntry
member.summary: The entry that is currently selected

member.summary: Gets the creatures name through and removes all white space characters

member.name: T:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType
member.summary: The type of unlock this UnlockToken targets

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.None
member.summary: This means this part of the description will always be visible if the entry is visible, however, unlike modules with no unlock token, this wont make the entry visible

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Tamed
member.summary: For when the player tames the creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Evaded
member.summary: For when the player evades the creature, by dodging an attack, climbing to a place it can't reach, etc

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.SnuckPast
member.summary: For when the player sneaks past a creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Observed
member.summary: For when the player sees the creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.ObserveFear
member.summary: For when the player sees the creature run away in fear

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.ObserveFood
member.summary: For when the player sees the creature eating or hunting another creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.ObserveHunting
member.summary: For when the player is getting chased by a creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Killed
member.summary: When the creature is killed by the player

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Impaled
member.summary: When the creature gets impaled with a spear, by the player

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Stunned
member.summary: When the creature is stunned, by the player

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.KilledPlayer
member.summary: When the player is killed by the creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.GrabbedPlayer
member.summary: When the player is grabbed by the creature

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.Eaten
member.summary: Whenever the creature gets eaten by the player

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.UnlockTokenType.ObserveAttraction
member.summary: Whenever the player observes a creature being attracted to something, such as batflies to batnip

member.summary: The process ID that gets called when an entry button gets pressed, you can leave this as the default menu, or make a custom menu to display the entry's information.

The main body of this entry

The name of the entry's icon in the atlas manager
The text that is shown when pressing on the entry while its locked

member.name: P:RainWorldBestiary.Entry.Error
member.summary: A default entry that's just an error, is always unlocked, and serves as a placeholder that appears when another entry cant be loaded

member.summary: Checks if this entry is the same as another entry

member.summary: The contents of the entry file

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.BaseLockedText
member.summary: A constant defining the default text that is shown when attempting to read a locked entry

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.UnlockID
member.summary: The ID of this entry, if the ID is found in the unlocked entries dictionary, this entry will be made visible

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.EntryUnlockedCondition
member.summary: The condition that specifies whether this entry is visible or not, if this returns true, then the entry is visible. You can leave this as the default, or set your own custom condition.

member.name: M:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.DefaultEntryUnlockedCondition(RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo)
member.summary: Checks whether any unlock tokens in have the for with a value that is equal to or lower than the required value
member.returns: True if the entry should be locked, otherwise false

member.summary: Checks if this entry info's unlock id and icons match

member.name: P:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.EntryUnlocked
member.summary: Returns true if the entry is visible, else false

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.LockedText
member.summary: The text / tip that is shown when attempting to read the entry while its locked, this could be anything you want, leave blank for no message.

member.summary: Whether the two icons specified by will be displayed either side of the title

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.TitleSprite
member.summary: The title image that gets displayed at the top when of the screen while reading the entry, if set to null, or if the image isn't found, some generated text will be placed instead
member.remarks: By title, I mean the name of the entry that is visible at the top while reading the entry

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.EntryColor
member.summary: The color of the entry's button and title image

member.name: F:RainWorldBestiary.EntryInfo.Description
member.summary: The body of this entry, when converted to string, only returns the parts of the entry that are visible

member.param: The body of this entry
The ID of this entry, if the ID is found in the unlocked entries dictionary, this entry will be made visible

The name of the sprite in the atlas manager that will be used as the entry icon

The ID of this entry, if the ID is found in the unlocked entries dictionary, this entry will be made visible

member.summary: Whether this module contributes to making the entry visible
